org.gradle.platform.base.component

Class BaseComponentSpec

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.gradle.platform.base.component.BaseComponentSpec
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Named, ComponentSpec

    @Incubating
public abstract class BaseComponentSpec
extends Object
implements ComponentSpec
    Base class for custom component implementations. A custom implementation of ComponentSpec must extend this type.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface org.gradle.api.Named
